text: Handle with Care is a 1977 American comedy-drama movie directed by Jonathan Demme and starring Paul Le Mat, Candy Clark, Bruce McGill, Roberts Blossom, Charles Napier, Ed Begley Jr. and Harry Northup. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==References == ==Other websites== * Category:1977 comedy movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Demme Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s comedy- drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Nebraska Category:Movies about revenge
title: Handle with Care
